user.name: Matías
title: Full Stack Developer Jr
Economics Student
user.about: I am a proactive, responsible and detailed-oriented person. I like continuous improvement; always looking for ways to change and develop current systems, methods, and results. In addition, I enjoy lifelong learning and feel grateful for every opportunity to acquire knowledge and skills in order to enhance my future career.

projects.description: Sabiendo que word-wrap es el único soportado por todos los navegadores y que hyphens nos aporta una mejora en cuanto a las reglas y el modo de partir las palabras, a menos que debamos enfrentarnos a un texto multi-idioma.
